targets.query:
from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_block_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transaction_count" or r["_field"] == "milestone_count" or r["_field"] == "tagged_data_count" or r["_field"] == "no_payload_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_block_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "confirmed_count" or r["_field"] == "conflicting_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_ledger_outputs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "basic_count" or r["_field"] == "alias_count" or r["_field"] == "nft_count" or r["_field"] == "foundry_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_ledger_outputs")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "basic_amount" or r["_field"] == "foundry_amount" or r["_field"] == "nft_amount" or r["_field"] == "alias_amount")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

import "strings"
import "math"

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_addresses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_amount_0" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_1" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_10" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_11" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_12" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_13" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_14" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_15" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_2" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_3" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_4" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_5" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_6" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_7" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_8" or r["_field"] == "total_amount_9")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: string(v: math.pow10(n: int(v: strings.split(v: r._field, t: "_")[2])) / 1000000.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_addresses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "address_count_0" or r["_field"] == "address_count_1" or r["_field"] == "address_count_10" or r["_field"] == "address_count_11" or r["_field"] == "address_count_12" or r["_field"] == "address_count_13" or r["_field"] == "address_count_14" or r["_field"] == "address_count_15" or r["_field"] == "address_count_2" or r["_field"] == "address_count_3" or r["_field"] == "address_count_4" or r["_field"] == "address_count_5" or r["_field"] == "address_count_6" or r["_field"] == "address_count_7" or r["_field"] == "address_count_8" or r["_field"] == "address_count_9")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_base_token_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "booked_amount")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_base_token_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "transferred_amount")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_addresses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "address_with_balance_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_active_addresses")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_output_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alias_created_count" or r["_field"] == "alias_governor_changed_count" or r["_field"] == "alias_state_changed_count" or r["_field"] == "alias_destroyed_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_output_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "nft_created_count" or r["_field"] == "nft_destroyed_count" or r["_field"] == "nft_transferred_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_output_activity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "foundry_created_count" or r["_field"] == "foundry_destroyed_count" or r["_field"] == "foundry_transferred_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_transaction_size_distribution")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "input_0" or r["_field"] == "input_1" or r["_field"] == "input_2" or r["_field"] == "input_3" or r["_field"] == "input_4" or r["_field"] == "input_5" or r["_field"] == "input_6" or r["_field"] == "input_7" or r["_field"] == "input_huge" or r["_field"] == "input_large" or r["_field"] == "input_medium" or r["_field"] == "input_small")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_transaction_size_distribution")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "output_0" or r["_field"] == "output_1" or r["_field"] == "output_2" or r["_field"] == "output_3" or r["_field"] == "output_4" or r["_field"] == "output_5" or r["_field"] == "output_6" or r["_field"] == "output_7" or r["_field"] == "output_huge" or r["_field"] == "output_large" or r["_field"] == "output_medium" or r["_field"] == "output_small")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_unlock_conditions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "timelock_count" or r["_field"] == "storage_deposit_return_count" or r["_field"] == "expiration_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Number of Unlock Conditions by Type

targets.query:
from(bucket: "chronicle")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_unlock_conditions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "expiration_amount" or r["_field"] == "storage_deposit_return_amount" or r["_field"] == "timelock_amount")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Tokens Held by Outputs with Unlock Conditions

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_unlock_conditions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storage_deposit_return_inner_amount")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value / 1000000}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "stardust_ledger_size")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_key_bytes" or r["_field"] == "total_data_bytes")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${aggregation_interval}, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_storage_deposit_amount")

list.description: The time interval over which the data is aggregated.
list.label: Time Interval
list.name: aggregation_interval
